review: I'm obsessed with my Fire Stick. This has replaced Chromecast in our home for the convenience of being able to access apps like Netflix and HBO Go, and take better advantage of Prime Video.

review: I am very happy with this stick, the price was good and I am able to use all my favorite apps without issue.

review: I had purchased 2 Fire TV Sticks for our house when they first came out and we enjoy streaming our choice of movies exactly when we want to see them. Enjoyed them so much that I purchased another for my daughter to use while away at graduate school. It's a great supplement to routine cable and local channels without the added costs of pay movie channels.
